after seeing the buildings they ate food
that was standing in the city .
output.sentences: I visited Rome this summer and there is nothing more beautifu than a Roman building.
The food I ate was just as awesome as the buildings I saw.
I am always blown away by how much history there is.
I can't believe that I've had the opportunity to visit the oldest standing city in the world.
